text: The Scottish Dental Practice Board was created on 1 April 1989. It was previously called the Scottish Dental Estimates Board. It is statutorily responsible for the fees (but not allowances) authorised to dentists by Practitioner Services. A a computerised payments system is operated for the board by NHS National Services Scotland. It also undertakes random and targeted examinations of patients through the Scottish Dental Reference Service. ==References== ==External links== Category:NHS Scotland Category:Dentistry in Scotland Category:1989 establishments in Scotland Category:Organizations established in 1989
title: Scottish Dental Practice Board
